Description: Mould-made pottery plastic lamp in the form of a bust of Dionysos, on a pedestal with a moulding along the upper edge. On top of the head is a pierced lug, and on the front of the pedestal in relief is a pylon-shaped panel with a short tubular projecting nozzle. The filling-hole is pierced through the back of the figure, and a small patch of clay is applied below the hole. Covered with a red slip.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q615)
